Header: Rebellious groups will not be given an opportunity for an uprising: Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka
Content: Leader of the Democratic Party , Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka states that rebellious groups will not be given an opportunity for an uprising. He made this statement while addressing a group of supporters in Udawalawe. The Leader of the Democratic Party said that the citizens of this country have no reason to fear. Speaking further he noted: We see them trying to lift their heads now and then. They are trying to re-group. They are flocking around their leader once more. But we have come so far and we would not let that happen.â€™
